doc.title: A New Waiter Opening a Fizz
doc.plot: "This waiter has just come in from the country and has obtained a position in a New York restaurant. He is seen serving an after-theatre repast to a young lady and gentleman. In the course of the dinner he brings in a bottle of champagne, which he proceeds to open with disastrous results. He covers himself and the diners with the foam, and makes a wreck of the dinner."
